title: “Principal Regulations” means the Health Services Regulations 1972 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Services (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Services (Amendment) 

Regulations 2021. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the Health Services (Drug Payment Scheme) 
Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 577 of 2017) and these Regulations may be cited 
together as the Health Services Regulations 1972 to 2021.

title: “Principal Regulations” means the Health Services Regulations 1972 (S.I. No.
heading: 5. The Regulations of 2020 are revoked.
text_raw:
5. The Regulations of 2020 are revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [595] 3 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 November, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 November, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: “Principal Regulations” means the Health Services Regulations 1972 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend Regulation 6 of the Health Service Regulations 1972 
(as substituted by Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2017 and subsequently 
amended by Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2020), by reducing the monthly 
co-payment threshold from €114, to €100 in any calendar month, for approved 
prescribed medicines or other items supplied under the Drug Payment Scheme. 

The Health Services (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 463 of 2020), 
which reduced the monthly co-payment from €124, to €114, are revoked and 
replaced by these Regulations. 

These Regulations come into operation on 1 January 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [595] 5
